name: Inherited Power
effects: Increase MAG by 80%, SPR by 30% and HP by 20%
Increase resistance to Fire, Ice and Lightning by 30%

name: Inherited Power
傳承之力

desc_short: Boost HP by 20%, MAG by 80%, SPR by 30%, fire, ice, and lightning resistance by 30%, and nullify silence
提高20%HP、80%魔力、30%精神、火兵雷屬性耐性的數值+沉默無效
HP 20%, 마력 80%, 정신력 30%, 불, 얼음, 번개속성 저항력 30% 상승+침묵 무효화
Augmente les PV de 20%, la MAGIE de 80%, la PSY de 30%, la rés. à feu/glace/foudre de 30% et annule silence
Erhöht LP um 20%, MAG um 80% und PSY um 30%, Res. gegen Feuer, Eis und Blitz um 30% und annulliert Stille.
Aumenta VIT un 20%, MAG un 80%, ESP un 30% y la res. al fuego, hielo y rayo un 30%, anula silencio
desc_long: Boosts HP by 20%, MAG by 80%, SPR by 30%, fire, ice, and lightning resistance by 30%, and nullifies silence.
提高20%HP、80%魔力、30%精神、火兵雷屬性耐性的數值，沉默無效。
HP 20%, 마력 80%, 정신력이 30%, 불, 얼음, 번개속성 저항력이 30% 상승하고, 침묵을 무효화합니다.
Augmente les PV de 20%, la MAGIE de 80%, la PSY de 30%, la résistance au feu, à la glace, à la foudre de 30% et annule silence.
Erhöht LP um 20%, MAG um 80% und PSY um 30%, Res. gegen Feuer, Eis und Blitz um 30% und annulliert Stille.
Aumenta la VIT un 20%, la MAG un 80%, el ESP un 30% y la resistencia al fuego, hielo y rayo un 30%, anula silencio.
